biography: Nicholas Talley is an Australian gastroenterologist, epidemiologist, researcher, and clinical educator. Most of his work centers on FGIDs. He currently serves as Distinguished Laureate Professor at the University of Newcastle, Australia and as Adjunct Professor at the University of North Carolina, USA. He is also Director, NHMRC Centre for Research Excellence in Transforming Gut Health and an NHMRC Leadership Fellow. He currently works as Senior Staff Specialist at John Hunter Hospital, Newcastle, Australia.
